memberdef.name: sopt_state_impl

detaileddescription.para:
Function which calculates a SOPT state. Should however toggle off the components not to be computed.
Q
Data type of the state, usually comp
Psi
State whose Vertex is to be calculated
Bubble_Object
Previously initialized bubble object.
Lambda
Data structure-needed parameter. Should be set to 1. in all SOPT calculations
state
State whose Vertex whould be the bare vertex already initialized

memberdef.argsstring: (State< Q > &Psi, const double Lambda, const fRG_config &config)
memberdef.name: sopt_state
